patthana2.3:319.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto
patthana2.3:319.1_1: ca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ
patthana2.3:319.1_2: ekaṁ khandhañca kāmāsavañca paṭicca tayo khandhā diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo …pe…
patthana2.3:323.1_0: Āsavañceva āsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā (nahetumūlakaṁ natthi),
patthana2.3:325.1_0: (Evaṁ itare dve gaṇanāpi sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paripuṇṇaṁ paṭiccasadisā.)
patthana2.3:326.1_0: Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana2.3:327.1_0: Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana2.3:327.1_1: paccayo—āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana2.3:328.1_0: Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana2.3:329.1_1: paccayo—āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā khandhā uppajjanti.

patthana2.3:330.1_1: paccayo—āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha āsavā uppajjanti.
